data.title: Lennie Gallant: The Innkeeper's Christmas
data.meta_description: Come join Lennie Gallant and his amazing band for some overdue Christmas Cheer!  Lennie’s is excited to bring his Innkeeper’s Christmas Concert to you this year. This holiday favourite is... Read more »
data.text:
Lennie has performed his Innkeeper’s Christmas show in Atlantic Canada for several years now to sold out crowds and this year’s multimedia version promises to be the best one yet. The show features his new band; partner and Acadian star Patricia Richard, multi instrumental phenom Keelin Wedge, and piano marvel Julien Robichaud. Lennie and this band have been knocking the socks off audiences for the past year, so get ready to hang them on the mantle and then fill ’em up with some musical treats that will make you fall in love with Christmas all over again!

Join us for an evening full of Lennie’s original songs, some traditional favourites, a load of laughs, great tales and occasional surprises. It will definitely put you in a Yuletide state of mind!

You don’t want to miss this special evening with one of the Canada’s best songwriters.

Tickets are $44.95 + HST each.

BUY TICKETS ONLINE HERE
